channel.title: Help with connect?
channel.description: Ok, I have been trying to make a private server (317) for about 2 years now... :( I have tried hundreds of sources and clients completely reset my computer several times and screwed up three routers trying to get somthing to work... I have done everything the tutorials say i've done everything people have told me would help... Whenever i get the server running my client can connect on the same computer when the ip is localhost, but as soon as i change the ip and recompile nobody can connect. I know people say this is easy but i think there is somthing wrong with what im doing... I have no-ip set up, I have port forwarded, I am absolutely sure the source works, I also have set the ip correctly and have the right java but i can never get the server to connect to external clients. Maybe someone can help on teamviewer??? :) idk just please someone help... in all the time i've been doing this not one person has been able to fix my problem... or even know what it is... :confused:

item.title: Help with connect?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Kooga:

If this problem is still going, go into client.java and press ctrl+f then search 127.0.0.1 and then change it to ur IP this may solve the problem.

I fixed it in the quote. This will allow him to connect to his client, but now others. You should try making the IP your IP but going

to whatismyip.com and copy and pasting it in the client. Put it in ALL of the IP places. Search things like no-ip, 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1

to be absolutely sure that you changed all the IP’s to your IP. Once done, put it up for download and when people start

playing, change ALL the IP’s back to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Help with connect?
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

but i know my ip is correct because i can use it to connect using remote desktop connection, and I portforwarded just like everyone else! I have done the exact thing it says to in all the tutorials…
Do you think you could check out my portforwarding in teamviewer? Maybe I just have a problem with the Source… Can you check plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with connect?
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

Ok, I have been trying to make a private server (317) for about 2 years now… I have tried hundreds of sources and clients completely reset my computer several times and screwed up three routers trying to get somthing to work… I have done everything the tutorials say i’ve done everything people have told me would help… Whenever i get the server running my client can connect on the same computer when the ip is localhost, but as soon as i change the ip and recompile nobody can connect. I know people say this is easy but i think there is somthing wrong with what im doing… I have no-ip set up, I have port forwarded, I am absolutely sure the source works, I also have set the ip correctly and have the right java but i can never get the server to connect to external clients. Maybe someone can help on teamviewer??? idk just please someone help… in all the time i’ve been doing this not one person has been able to fix my problem… or even know what it is…

Read full topic
